Articles.Content:
I have a few mission ideas, sorry if there already covered, I had a quick check but I could have missed them.

A rescue mission where more than one Kerbal needs saving.

Rescue and recover a craft/with or without kerbals. (bring the whole space ship back)

Rescue a ship from a cave or place not accessible to a flying craft. I never use rovers and think it would add lots to the game.

Be able to move the nav ball - I think there is a mod but oh how I wish I could move it somewhere else when I am landing! - That's all! Keep up the great work! Oh and make it so the Nav ball stay up if you leave the map then return.

Edited May 27, 2018 by Neebert
